name: Haust
description: Haust Network is a zkEVM Layer 2 blockchain built on the Polygon CDK, integrating AggLayer, Data Availability and Account Abstraction from the outset. It offers a seamless DeFi experience through Haust Lending and Haust DEX, along with native yield generation delivered via Haustoria, an innovative mechanism developed by Haust Labs, directly to Haust Wallet users. HAUST is a native token of Haust Network.
